top_comments.comment: Nadine’s new song “wait for me” reminds us that no matter how much you love each other, sometimes it’s better to let go not because you don’t value the person but only because you want to find your own happiness and come back as a better version of you. Although, the truth is you are holding on to a single hope that the person who mean the world to you would still wait until you are finally able to fix yourself being a mess but you don’t wanna be a selfish one either to keep the love and stay without giving assurance to anything so you took a heavy choice and that is to walk away carrying the faith deep in your heart that what’s meant to be will always be.🖤🤍
parang feel ng kanta ni selena gomez na lose you to love me hihi ganda mo nadine 😊
You can do your own thing and we will surely wait for you queen .
Sakit naman nkakaiyak 😭😭hindi PA ako nakamove on sa kanila dumagdag PA ang kantang toh😢😭😭
